name: Polygon
description: The Polygon Governance Hub enables community-driven decision-making for the Polygon aggregated blockchain network.

name: Puffer Financial
description: PufferDAO enables the community and its ecosystem participants to govern the Puffer protocol.

name: Mode
description: The Mode Governance Hub enables the community to participate in scaling DeFi to billions of users.

name: Aragon X
description: The Aragon X team is dogfooding their latest governance stack - the most modular governance stack on Ethereum.

name: Openmesh
description: Openmesh's OpenR&D is open-source platform designed to empower decentralized teams to collaborate seamlessly.

name: Steakhouse Financial
description: Steakhouse's Metamorpho vaults utilize Aragon Guardian DAOs to provide transparent and trustless community oversight.
